'''19w03c''' is the sixteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on January 18, 2019, which fixes one major bug.<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-19w03a|title=Minecraft Snapshot 19w03c|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240523175300/https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-snapshot-19w03a|website=[[Minecraft.net]]|author=[[Adrian Östergård]]|date=January 16, 2019}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=19w03c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|114779|Stairs render faces that cannot be seen normally
|130154|Checkerboard Buffet worlds incorrectly generate ocean and rivers.
|;prev
|142521|Players are invisible and do not interact with the world normally.
|142560|Chests sometimes remain open after closing the GUI.
|142577|Farmland glitches player.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 19w03c is the final 'c' snapshot, as the [[version format]] for snapshots changed in [[Java Edition 26.1 Snapshot 1|26.1 Snapshot 1]].
